name: Nature Inspired Set- Limited time offer!
description:
This is a gorgeous nature inspired set of nest jewelry! 

On their own, the studs are regularly $25 and the nature inspired nests are regularly $30. As  a set, they are $45. (Limited time only!)

Stud nest earrings, paired with a nature inspired nest necklace. These studs are hypoallergenic steel, and each nest is carefully and intricately woven into earrings. These nests gently nestle 3 turquoise colored eggs and are perfect to go with a pair of jeans or for a night out! They are an eye-catcher! The dimensions of the nest earrings are about just about 1mm or just under 3/8 of an inch. Smaller than a dime and dainty, but are super unique! A matching necklace is included, and each egg in the nest pendant looks almost like a real egg! 

A mama’s bird nest necklace represents the special love that a mother has for her young. Each nest has eggs that represent children, family members or loved ones! This bird’s nest necklace with turquoise eggs is a sweet little necklace to gift to someone special, or to keep as a special treat for yourself. Each necklace is handmade, handwoven and hand-moulded to create a small nest that perfectly and gently nestle 3 precious “eggs.” These necklaces are perfect for moms, moms to-be, grandmas and even bridesmaids! Each nest is lovingly and carefully handmade with care, and each and every nest carries it’s own special meaning unique to the person wearing it. Eggs can be customized to represent birthmonths, favorite colors or anything you would like! What a perfect way to represent your loved ones!

**Please select chain length and style at drop down menu (see last photo for reference) :)

name: Bird's Nest Necklace- gold, cream, robin's egg blue
description:
A mama’s bird nest necklace represents the special love that a mother has for her young. Each nest has eggs that represent children, family members or loved ones! This bird’s nest necklace with pearl glass eggs is a sweet little necklace to gift to someone special, or to keep as a special treat for yourself. Each necklace is handmade, handwoven and hand-moulded to create a small nest that perfectly and gently nestle 3 precious “eggs.” These necklaces are perfect for moms, moms to-be, grandmas and even bridesmaids! Each nest is lovingly and carefully handmade with care, and each and every nest carries it’s own special meaning unique to the person wearing it. Eggs can be customized to represent birthmonths, favorite colors or anything you would like! What a perfect way to represent your loved ones! 

The size of the nest is about 3/4 inch in diameter. Please note that each and every nest will be unique as they are handmade, but each and everyone will look pretty, I promise! :)

The difference between the thinner and thicker chain? (Please see the last picture). The thinner chain is dainty and thinner than the thicker chain. The thicker chain is recommended for those who will be wearing the necklace(s) around babies or toddlers. Otherwise, the thinner chain is a lovely match for the nest necklaces and is very fine, delicate and smoother than the thicker chain! 

Custom orders are welcome! Would you like one with different color or number of eggs? Or add initial charms? Initial charms are $1 each, and I can set up a custom listing for you for this as well :) Please click on the "Request a Custom" tab at the top and we can start designing your very own nest together! :)

Information about chain length:

Please select from drop down menu if you'd like a 16, 17 or 18 inch chain. I can also do 16.5 or 17.5 inches. (Please message me to let me know if you'd like half sizes). Depending on availability, longer chains are also available at cost. Please contact me beforehand if you need a chain length longer than standard lengths. Please message me and I can create a custom listing for you with your desired length :) Unless otherwise specified, the chain length will be approximately 18 inches. 

Please note that this exact one may have been sold and that I will be making a brand new one just for you, so it may look slightly different than the one in the picture. I promise it will look just as pretty! <3 

Each necklace comes wrapped, ready to gift to yourself or someone special.

name: Stud nest earrings
description:
The long awaited for STUD nest earrings are finally available! Adorn your ears with these little nests- they are simple, yet add interest to your outfit, whether you are going out for dinner or taking a trip to the grocery store! 

Bronze studs start at $22
Silver and rose gold toned start at $24

Please select from the following color options- You can select from the drop down menu. The picture below shows the color options- click it to enlarge the photo :) berry red, canary, mint green, army, teal, robin's egg, nature inspired (not speckled), amethyst, dusty purple, fuchsia, dusty rose, champagne, cream

The nests are just about the size of a dime- very small compared to the necklaces. The posts and earring backings are made out of surgical steel- they are suitable for those with sensitive ears, however those who have extra sensitive ears may not be able to wear them for prolonged amounts of time (ie- overnights) as the nest is woven onto the earring backs. That being said, I have had several individuals with sensitive (even extra sensitive ears) say that they are suitable for those with sensitive ears. 

To care for your nest earrings, please take them out while swimming or showering. 

Shipping info:
Canada: $2.50; $1 per additional item
